heroes.name: D.Va
heroes.bio: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.

details.title: FUSION CANNONS
details.info: D.Va's mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload, but slow D.Va’s movement while they’re active.

details.title: LIGHT GUN
details.info: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster.

details.title: BOOSTERS
details.info: D.Va’s mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

details.title: DEFENSE MATRIX
details.info: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air.

details.title: SELF-DESTRUCT
details.info: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents.

details.title: CALL MECH
details.info: If her armored battle suit is destroyed, D.Va can call down a fresh mech and return to the fray.

heroes.name: Hanzo
heroes.bio: Hanzo’s versatile arrows can reveal his enemies or fragment to strike multiple targets. He can scale walls to fire his bow from on high, or summon a titanic spirit dragon.

details.title: STORM BOW
details.info: Hanzo nocks and fires an arrow at his target.

details.title: SONIC ARROW
details.info: Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down.

details.title: SCATTER ARROW
details.info: Hanzo shoots a fragmenting arrow that ricochets off walls and objects and can strike multiple targets at once.

details.title: DRAGONSTRIKE
details.info: Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.

heroes.name: Lucio
heroes.bio: On the battlefield, Lúcio’s cutting-edge Sonic Amplifier buffets enemies with projectiles and knocks foes back with blasts of sound. His songs can both heal his team or boost their movement speed, and he can switch between tracks on the fly.

details.title: SONIC AMPLIFIER
details.info: Lúcio can hit his enemies with sonic projectiles or knock them back with a blast of sound.

details.title: CROSSFADE
details.info: Lúcio continuously energizes himself—and nearby teammates—with music. He can switch between two songs: one amplifies movement speed, while the other regenerates health.

details.title: AMP IT UP
details.info: Lúcio increases the volume on his speakers, boosting the effects of his songs.

details.title: SOUND BARRIER
details.info: Protective waves radiate out from Lúcio’s Sonic Amplifier, briefly providing him and nearby allies with personal shields.

heroes.name: Mei
heroes.bio: Mei’s weather-altering devices slow opponents and protect locations. Her Endothermic Blaster unleashes damaging icicles and frost streams, and she can Cryo-Freeze herself to guard against counterattacks, or obstruct the opposing team's movements with an Ice Wall.

details.title: ENDOTHERMIC BLASTER
details.info: Mei’s blaster unleashes a concentrated, short-range stream of frost that damages, slows, and ultimately freezes enemies in place. Mei can also use her blaster to shoot icicle-like projectiles at medium range.

details.title: CRYO-FREEZE
details.info: Mei instantly surrounds herself with a block of thick ice. She heals and ignores damage while encased, but cannot move or use abilities.

details.title: ICE WALL
details.info: Mei generates an enormous ice wall that obstructs lines of sight, stops movement, and blocks attacks.

details.title: BLIZZARD
details.info: Mei deploys a weather-modification drone that emits gusts of wind and snow in a wide area. Enemies caught in the blizzard are slowed and take damage; those who linger too long are frozen solid.

heroes.name: Pharah
heroes.bio: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.

details.title: ROCKET LAUNCHER
details.info: Pharah’s primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

details.title: JUMP JET
details.info: Pharah’s primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

details.title: CONCUSSIVE BLAST
details.info: Pharah’s primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

details.title: BARRAGE
details.info: Pharah’s primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

heroes.name: Reinhardt
heroes.bio: Clad in powered armor and swinging his hammer, Reinhardt leads a rocket-propelled charge across the battleground and defends his squadmates with a massive energy barrier.

details.title: ROCKET HAMMER
details.info: Reinhardt’s Rocket Hammer is an exemplary melee weapon, able to deal punishing damage in a wide arc with every swing.

details.title: BARRIER FIELD
details.info: Reinhardt projects a broad, forward-facing energy barrier, which can absorb substantial damage before it is destroyed. Though Reinhardt can protect himself and his companions behind the barrier, he cannot attack while sustaining it.

details.title: CHARGE
details.info: Reinhardt charges forth in a straight line, pinning the first enemy in his path and knocking others aside. If he collides with a wall, the foe he’s carrying suffers extreme damage.

details.title: FIRE STRIKE
details.info: By whipping his Rocket Hammer forward, Reinhardt slings a flaming projectile which pierces and damages any enemies it touches.

details.title: EARTH SHATTER
details.info: Reinhardt forcefully slams his Rocket Hammer into the ground, knocking down and damaging all enemies in front of him.

heroes.name: Symmetra
heroes.bio: Symmetra utilizes her light-bending Photon Projector to dispatch adversaries, shield her associates, construct teleportation pads and deploy particle-blasting Sentry Turrets.

details.title: PHOTON PROJECTOR
details.info: Symmetra’s weapon emits a short-range beam that homes in on a nearby enemy, dealing continuous damage that increases the longer it is connected. The projector can also release a charged energy ball that deals high damage.

details.title: SENTRY TURRET
details.info: Symmetra sets up a small turret that automatically fires speed-reducing blasts at the nearest enemy within range. Several turrets can be built on the battlefield at once.

details.title: PHOTON SHIELD
details.info: Symmetra surrounds an ally with a hard-light shield that absorbs damage and persists as long as that ally remains alive.

details.title: TELEPORTER
details.info: Symmetra surrounds an ally with a hard-light shield that absorbs damage and persists as long as that ally remains alive.

heroes.name: Tracer
heroes.bio: Toting twin pulse pistols, energy-based time bombs, and rapid-fire banter, Tracer is able to blink through space and rewind her personal timeline as she battles to right wrongs the world over.

details.title: PULSE PISTOLS
details.info: Tracer rapid-fires both of her pistols.

details.title: BLINK
details.info: Tracer zips horizontally through space in the direction she’s moving, and reappears several yards away. She stores up to three charges of the blink ability and generates more every few seconds.

details.title: RECALL
details.info: Tracer bounds backward in time, returning her health, ammo and position on the map to precisely where they were a few seconds before.

details.title: PULSE BOMB
details.info: Tracer lobs a large bomb that adheres to any surface or unfortunate opponent it lands on. After a brief delay, the bomb explodes, dealing high damage to all enemies within its blast radius.

heroes.name: Winston
heroes.bio: Winston wields impressive inventions—a jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more—with literal gorilla strength.

details.title: TESLA CANNON
details.info: Winston’s weapon fires a short-range electric barrage for as long as he holds down the trigger.

details.title: JUMP PACK
details.info: Assisted by his energy pack, Winston lunges through the air, dealing significant damage and staggering nearby enemies when he lands.

details.title: BARRIER PROJECTOR
details.info: Winston’s barrier projector extends a bubble-shaped field that absorbs damage until it's destroyed. Allies protected by the barrier can return fire from within it.

details.title: PRIMAL RAGE
details.info: Winston embraces his animal nature, significantly boosting his health and making him very difficult to kill, strengthening his melee attack, and allowing him to use his Jump Pack ability more frequently. While raging, Winston can only make melee and Jump Pack attacks.

heroes.name: Zenyatta
heroes.bio: Zenyatta calls upon orbs of harmony and discord to heal his teammates and weaken his opponents, all while pursuing a transcendent state of immunity to damage.

details.title: ORB OF DESTRUCTION
details.info: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs either individually, or in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power.

details.title: ORB OF HARMONY
details.info: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time.

details.title: ORB OF DISCORD
details.info: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time.

details.title: TRANSCENDENCE
details.info: Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.
